title: Bulgaria remains a country against GM crops (Ministry of Agriculture and Food of the Republic ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Agriculture and Food of the Republic of Bulgaria ) 10/1/ 2015 3:43:51 PM Ministry of Agriculture and Food reaffirms its position: Bulgaria to be exempted from GM crops . This is stated in the 10 notification letters that
